ProcessPage.title: Our AI-Powered Process
ProcessPage.subtitle: Experience the seamless workflow of transforming your ideas into precise 2D plans.
ProcessPage.step1Description: Securely upload photos or scans of your rough apartment layouts. We support various image and PDF formats.
ProcessPage.step2Description: Our advanced AI algorithms analyze your input, detecting walls, doors, windows, and structural elements.
ProcessPage.step3Description: Receive a clean, precise 2D plan with accurate dimensions, clear wall thicknesses, and correct symbol placements.
ProcessPage.step4Description: Review your generated plan, make minor adjustments if needed, and download in multiple formats (e.g., SVG, PNG, PDF).

AboutPage.title: About FlatMap AI
AboutPage.subtitle: Revolutionizing 2D floor plan generation with artificial intelligence.
AboutPage.section1Paragraph1: At FlatMap AI, we believe in simplifying complex tasks. Our mission is to empower architects, designers, and real estate professionals by providing an innovative AI-driven solution for generating precise 2D floor plans from any input.
AboutPage.section1Paragraph2: We are dedicated to accuracy, efficiency, and user-friendliness, ensuring that our technology not only saves time but also enhances the quality of your work.
AboutPage.section2Paragraph1: Our team is composed of passionate AI researchers, software engineers, and design experts. We leverage cutting-edge machine learning and computer vision techniques to push the boundaries of what's possible in architectural drafting.
AboutPage.section2Paragraph2: We are constantly evolving, integrating the latest advancements in AI to provide you with the most reliable and advanced tools.
